definition: reckoned to be first or second best (idiom)/one of the very best/to list one by one
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Bacon still remains one of the top movie stars in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 而贝肯仍旧是好莱坞数一数二的电影明星。

sentences.english: Laboratory building in the intensity of investment in Hebei enterprises in one of veterinary drugs.
sentences.chinese: 实验室的建设投入的力度在河北兽药企业中数一数二。

sentences.english: Captain Aizen's ability has ranked among the top of all captains.
sentences.chinese: 蓝染队长的能力在队长当中数一数二。

sentences.english: Pettersson is heading the project for one of Sweden's largest property owners.
sentences.chinese: 彼得森正在领导这个瑞典数一数二的地产业主专案。

sentences.english: The beaches in Thailand are some of the best in the world.
sentences.chinese: 泰国的海滩也是世界上数一数二的。

sentences.english: The orbits of these moons are some of the most complicated in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 这些卫星轨道的复杂度在太阳系当中算是数一数二的。

sentences.english: Of all Dezaou roasted chickens, only that Family Ma made in old Dexiang store is authentically original.
sentences.chinese: 咱们德州扒鸡，老德祥马家的是数一数二的正宗。

sentences.english: Thai food is regularly rated as some of the best in the world.
sentences.chinese: 泰式料理通常被列为世界上数一数二的美食。

sentences.english: Both are the same power level in one of the vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 两者的动力都是同级别车中数一数二的。

sentences.english: He is at the top of his class.
sentences.chinese: 他是班上数一数二的好学生。

definition: to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
to be considered as outstanding or special/to be reckoned with/notable
fully deserving, without any reservations (idiom); entirely worthy (of a title, honor etc)
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
second only to.../(in second place) preceded only by...
